source: National 211 network and Rhode Island Division of Veterans Affairs database

resources.name: Rhode Island Division of Veterans Affairs
resources.address: Rhode Island DEM - Division of Veterans Affairs
resources.description: State agency providing comprehensive veteran services including benefits counseling, disability assistance, housing programs, and employment support.

resources.name: 2-1-1 Rhode Island Information and Referral Service
resources.description: Free, confidential helpline connecting veterans to community resources including housing, employment, food, legal aid, mental health services, and benefits assistance.

resources.name: Veterans Crisis Line - National Support
resources.description: 24/7 confidential crisis support for veterans and loved ones. Free support 365 days a year. No VA enrollment required.

resources.name: Veterans of Foreign Wars - Rhode Island Posts
resources.description: VFW membership organization providing VA claims assistance, financial grants, mental wellness support, and community programs. Free assistance from accredited service officers.

resources.name: American Legion - Rhode Island Department
resources.description: National veteran service organization offering member benefits, community support, youth programs, and connections to state and federal benefits.

resources.name: VA Benefits Administration - Rhode Island Region
resources.address: Regional VA offices in Rhode Island
resources.description: Federal VA providing disability compensation, pension programs, GI Bill education, home loan assistance, vocational rehabilitation, and employment services.

resources.name: Volunteers of America - New England
resources.description: National nonprofit with New England presence providing mental health services, affordable housing, community outreach, and comprehensive veteran support.

resources.name: Operation Homefront - Military Family Support
resources.description: National nonprofit providing emergency financial assistance for military and veteran families. Assistance with rent, utilities, food, and healthcare.

resources.name: Military Officers Association of America (MOAA)
resources.description: Organization for military officers and families offering benefits guidance, career transition, financial planning, and exclusive member benefits.

resources.name: VetsinTech - Veteran Technology Education and Employment
resources.description: 501(c)(3) nonprofit connecting veterans with technology education, employment placement, and entrepreneurship opportunities.
